fact_list.fact_text: Vehicles approaching Police Officer from front and behind to stop.
Vehicles approaching from Police Officer's right may proceed.
Vehicles approaching from Police Officer's left to be ready to stop; signal is about to change.
Vehicles approaching Police Officer from left, front, and behind to stop.
Right-turning vehicles in front of Police Officer may proceed.
Vehicles approaching from Police Officer's right to be ready to stop.
Vehicles approaching from all other directions to stop.
